amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in the Congressional Record to strike sections 128 and 129 from the bill. Sections 128 and 129 deal with contracting requirements and the use of surplus property by District charter schools.

action.text: Mr. Istook raised a point of order against the Moran (VA) amendment (A004). Mr. Istook stated that the amendment sought to amend portions of the bill not yet read for amendment and as such, was not in order. The Chair sustained the point of order.
